data.persona: I am a large gray rat that scurries around in the castle walls. I like visiting the kitchen to snack on the bread crumbs. I carry diseases, so don’t touch me.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned mine entrance.
The abandoned mine is located in a field with a few trees. It is unable to be seen from far away. The closer you get the more you  notice the ground caving in around the hole. When you peer down into the mine, you see crumbling walls and concrete and a hole so deep you can't see where it ends.
The parishioner is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to find the parishioner's bag
data.mid_motivation: I hope to get food from the parishioner's bag today
data.long_motivation: I plan to survive until I can find my way back to the castle in the coming weeks
